room_title: Escape room "The Abandoned Factory" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: We had such a great experience! Everybody who greeted us was so friendly, knowledgeable, and enthusiastic that it made us that much more excited for the experience. Our group went through the Abandoned Factory room, which was very challenging and well thought out. Our gamemaster was Jonathan, who was so helpful to us. He really took the time to explain all the instructions and answer any questions that we had. Overall , this was a really great time that we'll never forget. I hope to try another room here soon, and I would definitely recommend this location to anyone interested in trying an escape room.

room_title: Escape room "The Abandoned Factory" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: I've been here hree times on separate occasions and all for team building events and it was AMAZING every time! First time we did The Interrogation room (no longer available) and unfortunately we didn't escape. Second time around (different team) we tried The Apartment and we didn't escape. I was NOT giving up so third time was a charm! Third time (different team) we did the Abandoned Factory and we ESCAPED! Woo hoo! All the staff and game masters are amazing! Quick, easy availability to book online also.

room_title: Escape room "The Abandoned Factory" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: We had a great time. It was a family event and we succeeded... We were in the Abandoned Factory and we got out! Our game master, Erica, was so helpful and her introduction made all the difference. Thank you, Alyssa, for assisting me w/booking the room, her advice was helpful too!

room_title: Escape room "The Abandoned Factory" by Can You Escape? LI in New York
review: Karli and John were awesome! This was my first time at an escape room and I'm already planning a second trip there. My friends and I did the Factory room which was awesome and we are planning on doing prison break next time. Thank you for the awesome experience and I'm so excited to come back!
